A2 a unit of measurement equal to 1,000 metres
Examples
He walks two kilometres to work every morning.They were going at about 60 kilometres an hour when their car hit the tree.We travelled northeastwards for about 250 kilometres.A few kilometres from the crowded beaches of Spain's Mediterranean coast, many once-thriving villages stand deserted and in ruins.According to the map, the village lies about 10 kilometres to the east of here.
